content2.text: This application - AUCS website should be considered as the 'aggregator and a transient station' between the Aurelia Community and Aurelia core team headed by @EisenbergEffect, meaning that it offers a data buffer content of which could be asynchronously moved to Aurelia proper website.To further facilitate this, all of our data is formatted as markdown files - AUCS website just provides structured interface to this data.
